longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of USA must be valid on arrival. 
- Warning: if departing from the USA (regardless of any
  destination passport exemptions), a valid passport and/or
  accepted departure document  is required by the
  US immigration authorities. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Passport is not required for those arriving directly from
  the US mainland, Alaska, Hawaii, Northern Mariana (Isl.),
  Puerto Rico, Samoa (American), Swains Isl. or the Virgin
  Isl. (US);
- For additional exemptions and requirements see passport
  exemptions mentioned for the USA. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- Minors travelling accompanied by one parent or by a person
  other than parent/legal guardian
